playerrights = 0
Chagne the 0 to 3.

item.title: Easiest question you'll have to answer
item.dc:creator: @skeebo skeebo
item.description:
@skeebo wrote:

i’ve started using the jordiescape source, and i can’t make myself owner…whatever i do doesn’t work, but i don’t get any errors on my compiler

[code]//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

checkmods();
checkadmins();
checkstaff();
if(checkmods() == 5)
playerRights = 1;
if(checkadmins() == 5 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“uradc”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“wh1p”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(""))
playerRights = 2;
if(checkstaff() == 5 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“hahahahhah”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“h36h356h356h”))
playerRights = 2;[/code]

the names came with the source, what do i do…

Read full topic
item.source: Easiest question you'll have to answer
